Package com.simon.simontree.model

Class ModificationGroup

java.lang.Object
com.simon.simontree.api.TreeElement
com.simon.simontree.model.ModificationGroup
Direct Known Subclasses:
DiscountedModificationGroup
public class ModificationGroup extends TreeElement
Represents a modification group in the tree structure with a list of Modifications , unlike a Modification it does not have a TypeOfModification value. ModificationGroup implement parent-child hierarchy via parentModificationGroup and childModificationGroup. The class is extensible, you can extend it with specialized subclasses. Auto-generated . Capable of adding and removing Modification and child ModificationGroup. Level is calculated in ModificationBinaryTree. The class is extensible, you can extend it with specialized subclasses for custom functionality.

Key extension points:

  • Override calculateTotalCostOfEveryModificationUnderThisGroup() to implement custom cost calculation logic
  • Override calculateTotalPriorityValueOfEveryModificationUnderThisGroup() to implement custom priority value calculation logic
  • Override updateCalculatedValues() to implement custom cost calculation logic

Example subclass: 


   public class DiscountedModificationGroup extends ModificationGroup{
   public DiscountedModificationGroup(Set<Modification> modifications, String name) {
   super(modifications, name);
   }

    @Override
    protected long calculateTotalCostOfEveryModificationUnderThisGroup(Set<Modification> modifications) {
    return (long) (super.calculateTotalCostOfEveryModificationUnderThisGroup(modifications)*0.9);
    }
    }

Extends the abstract class TreeElement, which consist of:

  • protected static AtomicInteger id = new AtomicInteger(0);
  • protected String name;
  • protected int priorityValue;
  • protected long cost
  • protected int level

Null checks:

  • nullcheked String
  • nullchecked TypeOfModification

Key characteristics:

  • unique (auto-generated)
  • extends TreeElement, which has id, name, priorityValue
  • base cost and TypeOfModification based
  • constructor auto-calculates , which is the sum of the priority value of all Modifications, which belong to this ModificationGroup
  • constructor accepts any type of Collection for compatibility
See Also:
  • TreeElement
  • ModificationBinaryTree
  • Modification
  • TypeOfModification

  • Constructor Details

    • ModificationGroup

      public ModificationGroup(Collection<Modification> modifications, String name)
      Constructs a new ModificationGroup with a set of modifications and a name.
      Parameters:
      modifications - the set of modifications to be included in this group
      name - the name of the ModificationGroup
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if either modifications or name is null

  • Method Details

    • addChildModificationGroup

      public void addChildModificationGroup(ModificationGroup child)
      Adds a child ModificationGroup to this group. Checks circular reference.
      Parameters:
      child - to add to parent ModificationGroup
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if childModificationGroup is null
      IllegalStateException - if the childModificationGroup already belongs to another group

    • removeChildModificationGroup

      public boolean removeChildModificationGroup(ModificationGroup childModificationGroup)
      Removes a child ModificationGroup from this group.
      Parameters:
      childModificationGroup - the child ModificationGroup to remove
      Returns:
      true if the child was removed successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if childModificationGroup is null
      IllegalStateException - if the childModificationGroup doesn't belong to any group

    • addModifications

      public boolean addModifications(Collection<Modification> modifications)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the Modification was added successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if Modification is null

      NullPointerException - if Modification is null

    • updateCalculatedValues

      protected void updateCalculatedValues()
      Helper method that updates all calculated values for this ModificationGroup but does not propagate the changes to parent ModificationGroup because it is not need. Priority value and total cost are re-calculated.

    • calculateTotalCostOfEveryModificationUnderThisGroup

      public long calculateTotalCostOfEveryModificationUnderThisGroup()
      Calculates the total cost of every Modification attached to this ModificationGroup
      Returns:
      totalCostOfEveryModificationUnderThisGroup is returned, as a long
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if Set is null

      protected int calculateTotalPriorityValueOfEveryModificationUnderThisGroup()

      Returns:
      totalPriorityValueOfEveryModificationUnderThisGroup is returned, as an int
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if Set is null
